name: Healthyfied Cabbage Pancake
description: Indulge in the health benefits of a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal with our Healthyfied Cabbage Pancake. This recipe is perfect for those looking to enjoy Healthy Recipes without compromising on taste. Great for a nutritious breakfast or a light dinner, this Healthified Recipe is sure to impress.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the green cabbage into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs until well beaten.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped cabbage to the beaten eggs and mix until the cabbage is evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cabbage and egg mixture into the pan, spreading it out to form a large pancake, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until the bottom is golden brown, then carefully flip the pancake and cook the other side until golden brown, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
